Title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Muffins (JoannaSoh)
Ingredients: 1/2 cup Soy Milk (or any other Milk) 50Cals
Instructions: In a small bowl, mix 1 tbsp of chia seeds with 3 tbsps. of water.
Allow the mixture to sit for about 5 minutes until it becomes pudding like, just like a raw egg yolk.
Add the wet ingredients to the chia mix
In a large bowl, add all the dry ingredients
Combine the dry and wet ingredients
Scoop the batter into 6 muffin tins
Bake in a pre-heated oven at 180 degrees Celsius or 350 degree Fahrenheit for about 15 minutes, until a toothpick inserted comes out clean.
